title: Permanent Account Suspension
body:
Apparently my account has been suspended for the use of third party programs or scripts, yet the only thing i use is a macro for calling roles. 
The permanent suspension is unjustly applied as I've never tried to use scripting methods or unapproved third party programs.

According to the wife of a LoL forum 'wrenchman' I know of: 
"I know the algorithm they use does not detect everything (hence it's secret), but only clicks on confirmed uses. He [me] might not use anything unfair knowingly, but somehow he triggered it" 
I'm assuming that the client has picked up on some form of modifications to it, and has sent some form of ban/suspension request to the server and has suspended the account. 
I know for utmost certainty that my account is clean (suspended once for something a while back for 24 hours and the occasional 20 min 5 game dodge timer) and that my client has never been modified. 
It's also interesting to note that my smurf account (haven't played on it for ages) is fine, yet is used on the same system.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Bans for the use of 3rd party programs/scripts are usually pretty solid, there is no official list of approved 3rd party programs as far as I'm aware so it's possible you used something that violated the ToS without even realising it was against the rules.

Sounds like you've already got a ticket open, so wait for a response there as Player Support are the only ones who can deal with account related issues.
If there's no official list of approved/banned 3rd party programs, whats to prevent us from violating the ToS without realizing it again???

Apologies, I was mistaken.

You can take a look at [this list](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt) for a guideline as to what is allowed/disallowed.

I'd also recommend reading [this post](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/our-stance-3rd-party-applications) by Riot TMX regarding Riots stance on third party applications.

The same has also been [posted on the NA boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5kx4F7VE-reminder-third-party-applications) by Riot Cluvie.

Hmmm hopefully the player behavior team can provide me evidence of whatever program I used, because as it says in that list, custom skins are allowed (unless this recently become not allowed however I am not aware of this happening). Thanks for the links dude :)
Unfortunately player behaviour can't provide evidence or name what you used that was detected, due to the potential of it interfering with future investigations.
I'm just going to get knocked back without even knowing what may have caused me to get banned in the first place? That's ridiculous.

I was also banned for this reason this morning , number one I wasn't logged on this morning , number two I have NONE of the program's mentioned in the list , I play league for fun with mates .. This is stupid
Me too, the only program I used was wooxy, to inject a custom skin into the game (which is apparently fine by Riot). I'm awaiting a reply from Riot too. I feel you.
Yes, If you're wondering, I have submitted a ticket to Riot. I'm just waiting on their verdict for now
